title: Progress with precision
brief_description: Visits various industrial centres in England and shows how Capstan and Turret Lathes are made. All the elaborate components are examined, along with the finished machines.
description: Visits various industrial centres in England and shows how Capstan and Turret Lathes are made. All the elaborate components are examined, along with the finished machines.
